dcterms:creator: I. C. Moreira
M. Heath
K. Bowyer
D. Kopans
R. Moore
W. P. Kegelmeyer
dcterms:description: The DDSM dataset contains 2620 digitized film-screen screening mammography exams, with pixel-level ground truth annotation of lesions. Cancerous lesions have histological proof.
dcterms:title: Digital Database for Screening Mammography (DDSM)

dcterms:creator: I. C. Moreira
dcterms:description: The INbreast dataset contains 115 FFDM cases with pixel-level ground truth annotations, and histological proof for cancers. The dataset is used for testing the classification and localization performance.
dcterms:title: INbreast

dcterms:description: The dataset from the Semmelweis University contains 847 FFDM images of 214 exams from 174 patients, recorded with a Hologic LORAD Selenia device. It is used for improvement in the second stage of the DM challenge.
dcterms:title: Dataset from the Semmelweis University

dcterms:description: The Digital Mammography DREAM Challenge dataset consisted of 86000 exams, with no pixel level annotation, only a binary label indicating if breast cancer was diagnosed in the next 12 months after the exam.
dcterms:title: Digital Mammography DREAM Challenge (DM challenge)
